trg_text: Implementation of key government programmesCabinet commends the launch of another Sexual Offences Court in Bethlehem, Free State by Minister Michael Masuth This forms part of government s intervention programme in the fight against sexual violence against women, children and the vulnerable groupThese dedicated courts are equipped to provide specialised victim-support services which in turn help to improve conviction rate Government remains resolute to strengthen the criminal justice system so as to deal decisively with the violation of the rights of women and childreCabinet welcomes the launch by Minister Lindiwe Zulu of the Enterprise Development Academy based at the Gordon Institute of Business SciencThe Academy focuses on scholarship-based education and support to micro and small business owners by helping them grow sustainably to create further employment in the long ter The Academy is part of the solution to address youth

src_text: Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi eziqavileIKhabhinethi yakwamukela ukugunyazwa kweSivumelwano se-Grand Inga Esisayindiwe phakathi kweRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye ne-Democratic Republic of Congo (i-DRC) ukuze siyiswe ePhalamendIsivumelwano sihlinzeka ngohlaka lomsebenzi wokukhomba indlela yokuphehlwa kwamandla agesi kumklamo we-Grand Inga kanye nokuhanjiswa kwawo emngceleni ophakathi kwe-DRC neZambi Ukugunyazwa kweSivumelwano kuzokwenza kuthuthuke Isigaba sokuqala Somklamo, okuzohlinzeka ngamaMegawathi angama-2
trg_text: comes to supporting job creation through enterprise developmen In order to flourish, business creation needs an enabling environment where entrepreneurs have access to funding, best-practice tools and skills development Key Cabinet decisionsCabinet approved the ratification of the signed Grand Inga Treaty between the Republic of South Africa and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) for tabling in ParliamenThe Treaty provides the framework for the facilitation of power generation from Grand Inga Project and its delivery to the border between the DRC and Zambi Ratification of the Treaty enables development of Phase I of the Project, which will provide 2 500 Megawatts of electricity to South Africa and contribute to regional integration,

src_text: 500 kagesi eNingizimu Afrika uphinde ube negalelo ekuhlanganeni kwesifunda, ukutholakala kwamandla kagesi, ukufinyelela ukuthola amandla nokukhula komnotho ngendlela yemvelo esimemUmklamo uzokwazi ukuphakela ugesi wamanzi ohlanzekile futhi ofinyelelekayo ukuze kuhlangabezwane nezidingo ze-DRC, iNingizimu Afrika kanye namazwe akhelene nay Ibandakanya ukuphehlwa kukagesi wamanzi ongalinganiselwa kumaMegawathi ayi-40 000 Emfuleni i-Congo, ngaphezu kwezigaba eziyisikhombis Umklamo ungakwazi ukusheshisa ukuthuthukiswa kwe-SADC; inciphise indlala yamandla kagesi, ikhuthaze ukukhula komnotho iphinde ikhombe indlela yokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizindUmklamo we-Grand Inga uzobe uhlose ukusebenzisa ugesi ongenziwa Wumfula i-Congo, owumgudu omkhulu wamanzi e-Afrika eseningizimu ye-Sahar Lokhu kumele enye yemiklamo ethembisayo kakhulu eke yaba khona kuzwekazi lase-Afrika, futhi ezoba ngenye yenkomba eyonkeneza njalo yokuvuka kwe-Afrika nabantu bayIKhabhinethi yanqampunelwa ngeNgqungquthela Yamazwe Ngamazwe Yobulili, Amanzi Nentuthuko ezay Ingqungquthela izosingathwa wuMnyango Wezamanzi nokuThuthwa Kwendle, Abacwaningi baManzi kanye nabasebenzisana nabo kulo mkhakh Ingqungquthela izobanjwa kusukela mhla zi-3 kuya mhla ziyi-7 kuLwezi eMonti, (East London) ngaphansi kwengqikithi ethi

src_text: Lokhu kuzosiza ukuvikela ngendlela izimali ezifakwa abadayisi kunciphe nokulahlekelwa kwabatshalimali e-ABLokhu kuzophinde kuqinisekise ukuthi umkhakha wezwe wezimali uhlala uqinile futhi unamandlIKhabhinethi igcizelele ukubaluleka komkhakha wezinsizakalo zezimali ukukhulisa umnotho futhi yakugqamisa ukuthi uhulumeni, ngoMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke, uzoqhubeka ukuqinisa umkhakha, nokwenza umsebenzi wayo wokuqapha, futhi yenze ngcono ukuhlela ukulawula ngokomthethIKhabhinethi ikuqaphelile ngokukhathazeka ukudluliselwa kolwazi olungelona mayelana nohlelo lokuhlela kabusha (inguqulela-buhleni) lwezikhwama ezahlukene zemali yomhlalaphansi (imali yempesheni nemali yoxhaso ebekwa ngabasebenzi).
trg_text: While government wants to encourage workers to preserve their savings until retirement, no laws have changed to stop withdrawal when workers change job By contrast, the various retirement reform proposals seek to:a) Encourage individuals to provide adequately for their own retirement and the needs of their dependents and to provide for retirement funding as part of the remuneration contract;b) Make retirement funding arrangements cost-efficient, prudently managed, transparent and fair; and c) Improve standards of fund governance, including standards of fund governance, including trustee knowledge and conduct, protection of members
